ThingDef.Name: GD_MSST_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular triple-shot
ThingDef.description:
Standard close range sidearm with good armor-piercing capability. Shoots three bullets at once.
Graydale Defense ATX10 "Ocelot" series Modular Sidearm System, standard triple-shot pistol version.
Unlike more conventional firearms like its precursor, the lynx tactical pistol, this weapon utilizes electrically primed ammunition and tube type magazine-chamber. It can deliver three armor piercing bullets at almost the same time.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_MSSS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular spitfire
ThingDef.description:
A short-range bullet-sprayer. It compensates for its mediocre damage by the sheer quantity of bullets.
Graydale Defense ATX10 "Ocelot" series Modular Sidearm System, burst pistol version.
This tube magazine pistol fires a burst of metal darts at an incredible fire rate.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_MSSF_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular flakker
ThingDef.description:
A light grenade launcher with a relatively longer range than hand-held grenades.
Graydale Defense ATX10 "Ocelot" series Modular Sidearm System, grenade pistol version.
Originally designed to flare gun, this weapon quickly adopted more lethal, explosive ammo.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_MSSH_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular hybrid pistol
ThingDef.description:
An advanced pistol with burst shot capability. Generally good performance.
Graydale Defense ATX10-A "Arctic Ocelot" hybrid pistol.
The most technologically advanced version of the Ocelot Modular Sidearm System, the "Arctic Ocelot" fires powerful armor-piercing projectiles by electrochemical hybrid fire-mechanism. Due to its design characteristics, hybrid pistol can't be decomposed into a modular sidearm kit.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_TacticalPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona security pistol
ThingDef.description:
A standard sidearm with armor-piercing projectiles.
Greydale Defense ATX8 "Lynx" light personal defense weapon.
A sturdy high-performance tactical pistol. Graydale Defence removed this pistol from their security guard's standard equipment list after the development of the more versatile Ocelot series. However, because of its great reliability, still many people use this pistol.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_ModularCarbine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular carbine
ThingDef.description:
A carbine with good close-range combat capability. With this gun and an Modular Rifle System Kit, You can build other MRS guns from Graydale equipment assembly facility.
Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System GEN6, carbine version.
This carbine is a good close-quarter combat weapon by itself, although it is usually considered material for other MRS guns. It has a robust and simple design that makes it popular for security forces.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_ModularRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular rifle
ThingDef.description:
A jack of all trades assault rifle. Can be disassembled to a modular carbine and a rifle kit from Graydale equipment assembly facility.
Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System GEN6, assault rifle version.
A versatile rifle utilizing caseless rounds. Because of its durable and simple design, this rifle model is very popular among colonial militias.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_ModularDMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular DMR
ThingDef.description:
A light sniper weapon with a relatively fast fire rate and low damage capability. Good for hit-and-run tactics. Can be disassembled to a modular carbine and a DMR kit from Graydale equipment assembly facility.
Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System GEN6, marksman rifle version.
A marksman rifle designed for precision fire support. This rifle is a also great tool for hunting.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_ModularLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular LMG
ThingDef.description:
An automatic weapon with a longer range than standard LMG. While it fires more bullet per burst than an assault rifle, its longer firing term makes it restricted to a more supportive weapon. Can be disassembled to a modular carbine and a LMG kit from Graydale equipment assembly facility.
Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System GEN6, light machinegun version.
A LMG with a sturdy design. This weapon is great for support assault troops with its unceasing bursts.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_HybridRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona modular hybrid rifle
ThingDef.description:
A general-purpose advanced rifle. It has a better armor-piercing capability and bullets per burst than a standard charge rifle, while has inferior damage and stopping power.
Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System GEN6 Mod.5. "Desert Panther" hybrid rifle.
Unlike the other panther MRS, this model utilized an additional firing mechanism for more firepower and armor-piercing capability. With acceleration from the electromagnetic induction barrel, it's projectile reaches a hypersonic speed.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_HVSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona security SMG
ThingDef.description:
An SMG that utilizes armor-penetrating bullets. Fast and leathal close combat weapon.
Greydale Defense ADW16 "Caracal" Hyper Velocity Projectile personal defence weapon.
The "Caracal" is an SMG that manufactured by Graydale Defence. While the Greydale Defense ceased its production after the release of a more versatile "Ocelot" series modular sidearm system, this weapon still produced by third-party gunmaker companies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_GrenadeLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona GD multi launcher
ThingDef.description:
Greydale Defense GMG31 "Jaguar" multi-purpose support launcher, fragment grenade launcher setting.
One of the most versatile fire support weapons, the "Jaguar" multi launcher is a reliable and effective fire support weapon. With a simple manipulation, you can change its setting from Graydale equipment assembly facility. Fires frag grenade from a long distance, this weapon can be a formidable problem in enemy's hands.
Frag: Basic setting of the multi launcher. Low damage, affects large area. Buckshot: Cloce quater combat setting. Fires multiple bucks at once. Incendiary: Deals flame damage and sets target on fire. Smoke: Deals no damage. Provide smoke screen on target area.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_INGrenadeLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona GD incendiary launcher
ThingDef.description:
Greydale Defense GMG31 "Jaguar" multi-purpose support launcher, incendiary grenade launcher setting.
One of the most versatile fire support weapons, the "Jaguar" multi launcher is a reliable and effective fire support weapon. With a simple manipulation, you can change its setting from Graydale equipment assembly facility. It fires incendiary grenade from a long distance. Neat.
Frag: Basic setting of the multi launcher. Low damage, affects large area. Buckshot: Cloce quater combat setting. Fires multiple bucks at once. Incendiary: Deals flame damage and sets target on fire. Smoke: Deals no damage. Provide smoke screen on target area.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_SKGrenadeLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona GD smoke launcher
ThingDef.description:
Greydale Defense GMG31 "Jaguar" multi-purpose support launcher, smoke grenade launcher setting.
One of the most versatile fire support weapons, the "Jaguar" multi launcher is a reliable and effective fire support weapon. With a simple manipulation, you can change its setting from Graydale equipment assembly facility. It usually deployed to provide a smoke screen to friendly troops or disrupt enemy fire.
Frag: Basic setting of the multi launcher. Low damage, affects large area. Buckshot: Cloce quater combat setting. Fires multiple bucks at once. Incendiary: Deals flame damage and sets target on fire. Smoke: Deals no damage. Provide smoke screen on target area.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_BSLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona GD buckshot launcher
ThingDef.description:
Greydale Defense GMG31 "Jaguar" multi-purpose support launcher, buckshot launcher setting.
One of the most versatile fire support weapons, the "Jaguar" multi launcher is a reliable and effective fire support weapon. With a simple manipulation, you can change its setting from Graydale equipment assembly facility. Unlike other multi-launcher settings, this weapon fire a blast of buckshot, not explosive canisters.
Frag: Basic setting of the multi launcher. Low damage, affects large area. Buckshot: Cloce quater combat setting. Fires multiple bucks at once. Incendiary: Deals flame damage and sets target on fire. Smoke: Deals no damage. Provide smoke screen on target area.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Hrunting_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona molten rifle
ThingDef.description:
A heavy battle rifle with high damage and top-notch armor-piercing capability. It has low accuracy and fire rate.
Jotun Interstellar JG-1421 "Hrunting" ULM(Ultra-density Liquified Metal) rifle.
Manufactured by Jotun Interstellar, this weapon fires molten metal as its bullet. The designer of the Hrunting was never concerned about petty problems like ergonomics. What he focused on was just pure firepower.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Trollsverd_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona molten pistol
ThingDef.description:
A heavy pistol with great firepower and armor-piercing capability.
Jotun Interstellar JP-1844 "Trollsverd" ULM(Ultra-density Liquified Metal) pistol.
Fires molten metal as its projectiles, a shot from Trollbane can solve most of the lonely colonies' problems.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Fafnir_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona siege shotgun
ThingDef.description:
A heavy shotgun with great armor-piercing capability. If you need to deal with heavily armored targets in close range, it will be one of the best option.
Jotun Interstellar JH-918 "Fafnir" ULM(Ultra-density Liquified Metal) snub cannon.
This oversized shotgun, made from a sawed-offed anti-air gun barrel, is a weapon designed to fight against mechanoids in urban warfare. If a person was to accidentally take a burst from this siege shotgun, they would be instantly turned into sticky red mist.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Gramr_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona AMR
ThingDef.description:
A super heavy anti-materiel rifle. Combined with extreme firepower, its long range makes it can deal with most targets from a safe distance. However, because of its terrible fire rates and staggering mass, it can't be expected to perform hit-and-run tactics.
Jotun Interstellar JG-330 "Gramr" Anti-Mechanoid rifle.
As heavy as a small truck and just as hard to wield, the recoil from a Gramr is as strong as the kick from a mule. But the firepower justifies everything.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Grendel_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona siege gun
ThingDef.description:
A portable short range multiple explosive metal ball launcher. Good against massed troops and fixed targets. Well, nothing much to say about it.
Jotun Interstellar JR-702 "Grendel" assault launcher.
The legacy of a grim mechanoid war, Jotun Interstellar's "Grendel" siege gun is one of the most devastating man-portable siege weapons in the galaxy. Fires super-cooled liquid metal as projectiles, it's projectile instantly solidified soon after hit the target area, leaving an explosion of metal shrapnels.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Muspell_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona suppressor cannon
ThingDef.description:
An automatic weapon with high stopping power. While its long burst makes its user vulnerable, it is suited to delays enemy advance.
Jotun Interstellar JM-7912 "Muspell" fragment discharger.
The "Muspell" suppressor cannon is a Jotun Interstellar's answer to small "militor" type mechanoid swarm. The Muspell ceaselessly fires super heated metal fragments.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: GD_Sabertooth_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona combat blade
ThingDef.description: A "Sabertooth" combat blade of Greydale Defence. Good for chop down trees or enemies limbs.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_BingJu_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona vibro-dagger
ThingDef.description:
YeonHwa Precision Vibro-Dagger model 1q. 'BingJu(Ice Pillar)'
Light yet surprisingly sharp, "BingJu" dagger is the standard melee weapon of YeonHwa Precision's Aggressive Marketing Division.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: JI_Ormbane_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Assault hammer
ThingDef.description: "Ormbane" is a massive combat sledge hammer that manufactured from Jotun Interstellar.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_Eris_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona impact knuckle
ThingDef.description:
A knuckle with fast attack speed. This can knock the enemies out for a moment.
Tisiphone Enterprise type-5 "Eris" close range kinetic energy discharger
The device produces a powerful, directed kinetic energy shock wave when striking an enemy. Do you wonder why the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent chose knuckles as their close combat weapon? The reason is simple. Because the pleasure of punching the federation soldiers to death with one's own fists can never be abandoned.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MeleeWeapon_TorchSword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona torch sword
ThingDef.description: The "Purifier" torch sword is a high-capacity plasma torch with a grip and blade. The weapon can be used by choosing between armor-piercing concentrated mode and wide-range irradiation mode.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_KineticRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kinetic rifle
ThingDef.description:
A fast firing single-shot rifle that shoots blunt damage projectiles with high stopping power. While it has low range and damage than other advanced rifles, its' short firing term and good accuracy makes its own niche.
Tisiphone Enterprise Type-3 "Tyrant" kinetic blast rifle.
The "Tyrant" is a service rifle of the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent. Created for close-quarter combat, one of the great advantages of the Tyrant is its cutting edge targeting systems for rapid target acquiring and tracking.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_KineticPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kinetic pistol
ThingDef.description:
Has a short firing term even in pistol standard, this pistol can be a great weapon for close-ranged hit-and-run tactics. Also, it deals blunt damage with high stopping power.
Tisiphone Enterprise Type-6 "Tormentor" kinetic blast pistol.
Standard issue sidearm of the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent, the "Tormentor" is a fast-firing personal defense weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_ThuddGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona thudd gun
ThingDef.description:
A close range weapon that shots areal blast projectile. Relatively freed from accuracy issues, this weapon can be good for dealing with enemy massed troops.
Tisiphone Enterprise Type-11 "Oppressor" kinetic canister launcher.
Unlike other ordinary close quarter combat weapon, the "Oppressor" canister launcher fires charged kinetic energy canister. It can be dangerous, even from its maximal range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_KineticLongRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kinetic long rifle
ThingDef.description:
A fast firing marksman rifle that deals blunt damage. Has high stopping power.
Tisiphone Enterprise Type-4 "Wailer" kinetic blast rifle.
Built for rapid counter snipe against the Federation snipers, the greatest strength of the "Wailer" is surprisingly fast target acquisition capability for the sniper rifle.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_StormCannon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona singularity projector
ThingDef.description:
This weapon fires multiple low damage blast that slows enemy movement for a moment. It is a more suppressing weapon than an assault weapon.
Tisiphone Enterprise Type-22 "Atrocity" area suppression system.
Fires a volley of kinetic energy blast, the "Atrocity" area suppression system was designed for suppressing multiple targets from afar. The Atrocity's wide-area subjugation capability made its reputation as a fearsome support weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: TE_KineticLance_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona kinetic lance
ThingDef.description:
It is a dangerous weapon to use because of its short range and long preparation time. However, its sheer firepower from this weapon makes it worth it to put up with hardship.
Tisiphone Enterprise Type-0 "Harrower" directional kinetic wave projector.
Tisiphone's answer to the Federation's mechsuits, the "Harrower" kinetic lance fires a continuous focused kinetic energy field. This weapon literally carves the target.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_SeoLi_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona shard rifle
ThingDef.description:
A short-ranged advanced assault rifle. Firing low damage projectiles at high fire-rate. Its projectiles have a high armor-piercing capability with almost none stopping power.
Yeonhwa Precision Shard rifle model 88c. 'SeoLi(Frost)'.
A short-ranged, fast firing rifle that uses carbon crystalline as its projectile. Compared to a conventional assault rifle, this shard rifle is equipped with a larger clip and a higher rate of fire. However, to achieve this the rifle sacrifices range and stopping power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_SagPung_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona swarmer
ThingDef.description:
A (sort of) short-ranged shotgun with highly precise projectiles. While it can hit almost everything in any conditions, low armor-piercing capability and mediocre damage make it a poor weapon against heavily armored targets.
Yeonhwa Precision Mechanite Swarm Projector model 1331a. 'SagPung(Boreas)'.
The swarmer is a short-ranged, extremely high accuracy nanotech weapon. It shoots intelligent mechanite swarm as its projectile. This lethal cloud of smart mechanite never looses its targets. Fast and incredibly accurate, it is an ideal tool for dealing with soft targets at close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_SangAe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona spike lance
ThingDef.description:
An anti-armor rifles firing explosive spikes. The projectile has a short delay until it explodes.
Yeonhwa Precision Explosive Crystalline Projectile Accelerator model 723a. 'SangAe(Frost haze)'.
Unlike more common anti-armor weapons, this weapon fires spikes made of high-density explosive crystalline. Its relatively fast rate of fire than other anti-armor weapons make SangAe the corporation's premier weapon to deal with heavily armored opponents.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_SeolHwa_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona dual shard pistols
ThingDef.description:
Close combat firearms with high fire-rates and good armor-piercing capability. Its downsides are extremely short range and low stopping power.
Yeonhwa Precision Hyper Rapid Shard Accelerator model 61t. 'SeolHwa(Snow blossom)'.
Originally built to personal defense weapon, this pistol's hair-raising fire rates carved countless bloody legends in corridors of the corporation world. The 121㎛ thickness crystalline shard of the pistol is designed to break in sharp fractal form when hit the target, causing maximum damage.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_GeugGwang_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona microwave emmiter
ThingDef.description:
A long range non-lethal areal suppressing weapon that (literally) makes enemies on fire. While its blast has no damage, organic targets will be busy putting out the lights for a while.
Yeonhwa Precision Microwave Emitter model 7r. 'GeugGwang(Aurora)'.
GeugGwang emits millimeter-waves that boil the water in the target's skin and thus causes incapacitating pain. While it has no use for dealing with machines, It is a perfect crowd control weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: YP_VectorShot_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona vector shot
ThingDef.description:
A special weapon with an indirect fire ability. Its vertical-launched projectile acts based on a mortar shell. So it can attack over the wall but can't shoot when the user is under the mountain roof.
Yeonhwa Precision Smart Projectile Launch System model 2357b. 'NuRi(Hail)'.
The vector shot is a weapon for urban warfare, shots guided system integrated smart bolts. With an aid of multi-spectral scanners, NuRi can aim at targets hidden in the cover. While ignoring the wall is a really strong feature, however, because of extremely short-range, NuRi's function is limited to an assault specialist weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
